DOC.brief_summary: A study compare effect once-daily atomoxetine versus placebo treat symptom ADHD adult 6 month .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Once-Daily Atomoxetine Hydrochloride Adults With ADHD Over Extended Period Time ( 6 Months )
